title: Bug 45145: Second window takes focus when interacting with the first
description: When switching from another application to an Eclipse window and clicking on a docked view or perspective, another window takes the front position, overlapping other application windows.
OB: When switching from another application to an Eclipse window and clicking on a docked view or perspective, the other window comes to the front over my other applications' windows.
EB: When interacting with an Eclipse window, clicking on a docked view or perspective should not cause another window to take focus and come to the front, overlapping other applications' windows.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open Eclipse.
2. Switch from another application to the Eclipse window.
3. Click on a docked view or perspective within Eclipse.
4. Observe if another window takes focus and comes to the front, overlapping other application windows.
